name: Tender Octaver Pro
details:
Polyphonic Pitch ShifterThis thing is truly polyphonic. This means play entire chords like Emaj7flat5 and you're going to a full on pitch shifted version of this with no tracking issues! This is game changing.
Rich and full. You can dial in anything from whammy pedal type screeching like Jack White all the way to throbbing baritone guitar type chords, to full on playing bass with your guitar. Has controls to adjust volumes of the initial signal, Octave Up signal, Octave Down signal, Pitch Ranges for Up and Down, tone controls, Memory Presets, AND an expression pedal input for whammying. Phew!
Sub and Upper Octave controls with Volume and Tone for each
Dry control dials in original signal
Memory Preset and Store for Instant Recall
Expression Pedal Input
True Bypass
Solid Built Metal Casing
Uses Standard Boss Style DC 9V Adapter
